enchantment.flaming.name: Flaming

enchantment.riposte.name: Riposte
enchantment.riposte.description: After a successful parry, for 3 seconds your next attack has +50% attack speed.
enchantment.frenzy.name: Frenzy
enchantment.frenzy.description: After a successful hit, gain 7% attack speed and 10% move speed for 4 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.
